law.catch_line: The county commissioners or circuit court for the county in which proceedings may be pending, at any...
law.text: The county commissioners or circuit court for the county in which proceedings may be pending, at any time before a final decision is made, may upon application of any party thereto, grant leave, in their discretion, to said parties to amend the petition, or any part of the proceedings thereunder that may be defective or informal so as to bring the merits of the case before said county commissioners or jury of the circuit court for trial, and may award costs in their discretion, according to the right of the matter.
